thread.title: Jan En Ricky Labuschagne
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Jan En Ricky Labuschagne

author: Jan En Ricky Labuschagne
title: Jan En Ricky Labuschagne
text: I bought and build the a3 2500mw laserengraver . I cannot get it to work on any of the software from the links they supplied . On benbox the laser stay on at full power . On eleks cam i can vontrole the laser manualy but when i try to engrave the laser comes on but it would not move on the axis . This is by far the worst thing i ever bought and i will not buy anything from banggood again . Thei is no after sevice and to retun the product is not worth it because of the cost .i have sent them email on email but no reply . So their is no after service . My opinion is that they are out to make money by selling s#@t stuff to people that trust them
